name: Greender
description:
Can't win over any vegetable in the garden? Are you tired of not even succeeding with the farmer who has cultivated you?

Try GREENDER, an app where you can meet the vegetable of your life with which you can take roots and who knows, maybe you will end up making a salad.

GREENDER is very easy to use, you will have to create a profile, select some tags based on your tastes and that's it! Although you have to be careful with whom you match, you never know who might have overdone it with oregano or pesticides.

Now it's your turn, who will you be juicing with tonight?
